title: Decide the alignment of Development Plan road / Regional plan road where the street layout actually
clause_text: Decide the alignment of Development Plan road / Regional plan road where the street layout actually on the ground varies from the street layout as shown on the Development Plan / Regional plan;
section: Qualification and Competence of the Architect / Licensed Engineer / Structural Engineer / Town Planner / Supervisor

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
